item.description:
The Worcester Photography Group –April Click & Shoot
What: A shoot with models in Green Hill Park
When: Saturday – April 18, 2009, 1 pm until (whenever people leave).
Where: Green Hill Park, Worcester. MA. Entrance off Route 9, meet at Veterans Memorial parking lot and pavilion.

It’s spring and time to get out and shoot. Add some sunny weather and some lovely models on a TF/CD shoot and it will be a fun day. There are lots of great background locations in Green Hill Park and Plenty of room for a whole crew of people. We can share models and switch up locations. It's going to be a great time.

Bring your camera and if you know a model or two, have them come on out to play! If you don't know any models – don’t worry – we will do a casting call on Model Mayhem looking for willing models.

If you do know a few models - please note that Models need to come already prepared to shoot (or bring their own MUA/Stylist. We are not providing MUAs or outfits.) So when they show up - they should be ready to be photographed!!

We'd suggest you bring some munchies and refreshments.... esp water and sunscreen!

Special Note: Photographers must be willing to give JPGs of their best shots to Lou Swinand, who will compile them and give each model a CD with their pics.

Rain date: Following Saturday, April 25.

Lou Swinand is organizing this shoot so if you have any questions just find him on the members list and zip him an email! Thanks Lou!

Cheers,
Donna

group.name: Worcester Alliance of Photographers - AKA: WAP

item.name: April Click and Shoot- Let's Photograph a Few Models at Green Hill Park
